Signs and Symptoms Approximate number of patients (when available) Abnormality of the face - Autosomal dominant inheritance - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Severe short stature - Small for gestational age - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is usually listed as a rough estimate
